data.name: Wyvia
data.detailed_description:
Inspired by classic Fantasy turn-based 8-bit games of old in it's aesthetic, this is anything but turn-based! Wyvia is an open-world 3D Action RPG featuring a class system with over 10 classes to choose from to switch things up and find the right build for you, a robust cross-class skill system to keep expanding your options, tons of different and varied upgradable weapon types, many cavernous and dank dungeons to explore, and a myriad of tough bosses to fight over the course of the story! Also you can ride a Wyvern! Will release on Steam by late 2022.

FUN COMBAT


Wyvia features fun and simple combat that feels good to utilize! Whack Goopies with a huge axe or fire away with screen clearing abilities!

BUILD VARIETY


In Wyvia, you can allocate points into stats and skills and create a character that's really your own! With tons of build variety, each character will play very differently.

RIDABLE WYVERN


Later on you can get a tame-able Wyvern you can fly around on and reach hard to reach places and secret areas. There's also mounted combat!
